events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to keywords indicating a refund request.
This support case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll be helping you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I also ask if you still have the item and the original packaging?
My order number is 9832745, and unfortunately, I already opened the package but still have the item and most of the packaging.
Thank you for the info. We can issue a full refund once you send the item back. I will email you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I appreciate the help and will send the package tomorrow.
The returned item was received and inspected. Your refund has been processed and should appear on your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
